name: Ultra Blade
description:
Defend the last city of mankind against the endless hordes of darkness

Actively choose when to dodge and heavy attack while slaying 100s of on screen foes.

Discover the perfect build

Awaken lost heroes with 1000s of potential weapon and ability combinations. Every newly-unlocked hero expands the total ability pool of upgrades that can be earned during a run.

Become the Ultra Blade

Level up and combine weapons to create devastating builds: Two-handed swords that generate explosive earthquakes, spiked bows that shoot ice-infused lasers, the possibilities are almost endless.

Rise to the Challenge

Take on dozens of challenge gauntlets that test your skills and character builds in unique and interesting ways.


Core features include:
-12 bespoke characters to unlock
-5 core class type (Greatblade, Bow, Gun, Staff, and Shield)
-100s of weapons and abilities to master
-1000s of potential character + weapon build combinations
-Endless Crusade mode that refreshes hourly
-27 Challenge gauntlets
-15 meta-altering relics to unlock
-Simple controls that work with just the arrow keys, a single controller joystick , or just the mouse.
